com.innolabs.spydroid

Class DataBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • SQLiteOpenHelper
      • com.innolabs.spydroid.DataBase

  • public class DataBase
extends SQLiteOpenHelper
    DataBase is a generic class for the SQLite Database creation in Android and is used to access the SQLite Database features with parameters and making it as Generic for all Database access types in the Application
    Author:
    Srikanth Rao
    See Also:
    SQLiteOpenHelper

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String DATABASE_TAG
      String value to show the TAG for the activity in the LOG CAT
      (package private) static Context dbcontext
      Static variable for the Context of the Database
      String SlNo
      String value used as a primary key for all the database tables created using @link DataBase class

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DataBase(Context context, String name)
      Simple Constructor for the DataBase class

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createTable(String table, String Values)
      Method used to create a new table if it does not exist in a Database
      void deleteRecord(String table, String id)
      Delete Record method is called if it is needed delete a particular row from a database table
      void deleteTableElements(String tableName)
      Method used to delete all the rows from a database table

      Delete values method called to delete the database tables

      Method used to execute raw queries to the database

      Method to retreive the rows from a database table

      Method called to insert values into a database table
      void onCreate(SQLiteDatabase db)
      onCreate is a method in DataBase used to execSQL commands as rawQueries
      void onUpgrade(SQLiteDatabase db, int oldVersion, int newVersion)
      onUpgrade method is called when the database is upgraded and need to be update in our application

               String Values)

        Values - String value for the Table Column names

             int oldVersion,
             int newVersion)
        onUpgrade method is called when the database is upgraded and need to be update in our application

      • insertValues

        public void insertValues(String table,
                ContentValues contentval)
        Method called to insert values into a database table
        Parameters:
        table - String value of the table name in which the data must be inserted
        contentval - Content Value object i.e data that is to be inserted into the database table

      • deleteValues

      • getValues

        public Cursor getValues(String table)
        Method to retreive the rows from a database table
        Parameters:
        table - Table name from which the rows must be returned
        Returns:
        Return the rows of the database table which was requested

      • deleteRecord

        public void deleteRecord(String table,
                String id)
        Delete Record method is called if it is needed delete a particular row from a database table
        Parameters:
        table - table name from which the row must be deleted
        id - the key i.e primary key through which the row is accessed

        Returns:

        Method used to delete all the rows from a database table
